Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If "Madolche Queen Tiaramisu" is destroyed by your opponent's card effect, such as "Dark Hole" or "Bottomless Trap Hole", the Xyz Materials will not be shuffled into the Deck. The Xyz materials under Tiaramisu are "sent to the GY" because of the game mechanics. But they are not "destroyed" and they are not sent to the GY "by your opponent's card".

PSCT.Vegas:
2 Level 4 "Madolche" monsters
① Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card, 
then target up to 2 "Madolche" cards in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, 
also, after that, shuffle cards your opponent controls into the Deck, up to the number returned.

PSCT.Base:
2 Level 4 "Madolche" monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target up to 2 "Madolche" cards in your Graveyard; shuffle those cards into the Deck, also, after that, shuffle cards your opponent controls into the Deck, up to the number of "Madolche" cards returned.
